class_notes: The delivery format listed for this class is based on current university guidelines.  However, if there are further changes to the COVID19 guidelines for Fall 2021 or other acts beyond our control, the school reserves the right the modify the delivery method for this class.
course_description: Introduction to the underlying models and thoeries of finance. The course is designed to be delivered as a hands-on style such that non-business students can learn the usefulness of finance models and theories.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the Emory College Liberal Arts and Sciences program.
